mapper.select: select nvl2(s.open, s.day, null) as day, nvl(s.open, null) as open, nvl2(s.open, t.hour, null) as close from (select s.day, s.close, t.hour as open from schedule s join timetable t on s.open = t.hourSeq and s.hpSeq = #{hpSeq} )s left join timetable t on s.close = t.hourSeq order by day asc
mapper.delete: delete bookmark where userid = #{loginuserId} and hpseq =#{hpSeq}
delete hospitalreview where hpseq=#{hpSeq} and userid=#{userid}
delete pharmacyreview where pharmseq=#{phSeq} and userid=#{userid}
